name: Equalize™ Poultry
description: Equalize™ Poultry is a species-specific feed supplement designed to achieve and maintain the production goals of poultry farms during feed toxins and other related challenges. Its unique combination of nutritional components works synergistically to maintain performance of birds when consuming feed of compromised quality.

Product Families: Formulated Feeds, Whole Foods and Extracts

Certifications & Compliance: Association Of American Feed Control Officials (AAFCO)
